mapper.select: select s.stu_num, p.pro_num, e.emp_num from (select count(*) as stu_num from users where 1=1 and user_type = 'STU') s, (select count(*) as pro_num from users where 1=1 and user_type = 'PRO') p, (select count(*) as emp_num from users where 1=1 and user_type = 'EMP') e
select a.attending, b.dropping from (select count(*) as attending from academic where 1=1 and aca_status = '재학') a, (select count(*) as dropping from academic where 1=1 and aca_status = '휴학') b

select edu.edu_num, hum.hum_num, gye.gye_num, sci.sci_num, eng.eng_num from (select count(*) as edu_num from colleage c, department d, academic a where 1=1 and c.coll_code = d.coll_code and d.dept_code = a.dept_code and c.coll_code = 'EDU') edu, (select count(*) as hum_num from colleage c, department d, academic a where 1=1 and c.coll_code = d.coll_code and d.dept_code = a.dept_code and c.coll_code = 'HUM') hum, (select count(*) as gye_num from colleage c, department d, academic a where 1=1 and c.coll_code = d.coll_code and d.dept_code = a.dept_code and c.coll_code = 'GYE') gye, (select count(*) as sci_num from colleage c, department d, academic a where 1=1 and c.coll_code = d.coll_code and d.dept_code = a.dept_code and c.coll_code = 'SCI') sci, (select count(*) as eng_num from colleage c, department d, academic a where 1=1 and c.coll_code = d.coll_code and d.dept_code = a.dept_code and c.coll_code = 'ENG') eng
